classes.name: Color
classes.description: Represents an RGBA color. The most commonly used java.awt class in Ignition Vision for dynamic styling of components.

constructors.description: Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified red, green, and blue values in the range 0-255.

params.name: a
params.description: The alpha component (0-255, where 0 is fully transparent)

constructors.description: Creates an sRGB color with the specified red, green, blue, and alpha values in the range 0-255.

params.name: rgb
params.description: The combined RGB value (bits 16-23 red, 8-15 green, 0-7 blue)

constructors.description: Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified combined RGB value.
Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified red, green, and blue values as floats in the range 0.0-1.0.
Creates an sRGB color with the specified red, green, blue, and alpha values as floats in the range 0.0-1.0.

methods.name: decode

params.name: nm
params.description: A String that represents an opaque color as a 24-bit integer (e.g., '#RRGGBB', '0xRRGGBB')

returns.description: The Color object representing the decoded color

methods.description: Converts a String to an integer and returns the specified opaque Color. Supports '#RRGGBB', '0xRRGGBB', and decimal formats.

methods.name: getHSBColor

returns.description: A Color object with the specified hue, saturation, and brightness

methods.description: Creates a Color object based on the specified values for the HSB color model.

methods.name: HSBtoRGB

returns.description: The RGB value of the color with the indicated hue, saturation, and brightness

methods.description: Converts the components of a color, as specified by the HSB model, to an equivalent set of values for the default RGB model.

methods.name: RGBtoHSB

params.name: hsbvals
params.description: Array to store HSB values, or null to allocate a new array

returns.description: An array of three floats: hue, saturation, and brightness

methods.description: Converts the components of a color, as specified by the default RGB model, to an equivalent set of values for hue, saturation, and brightness.

methods.name: getRed

returns.description: The red component (0-255)

methods.description: Returns the red component in the range 0-255.

methods.name: getGreen

returns.description: The green component (0-255)

methods.description: Returns the green component in the range 0-255.

methods.name: getBlue

returns.description: The blue component (0-255)

methods.description: Returns the blue component in the range 0-255.

methods.name: getAlpha

returns.description: The alpha component (0-255)

methods.description: Returns the alpha component in the range 0-255.

methods.name: getRGB

returns.description: The RGB value of this Color in the default sRGB ColorModel

methods.description: Returns the RGB value representing this Color in the default sRGB ColorModel. Bits 24-31 are alpha, 16-23 are red, 8-15 are green, 0-7 are blue.

methods.name: brighter

returns.description: A new Color object that is a brighter version of this Color

methods.description: Creates a new Color that is a brighter version of this Color. Uses a factor of 1/0.7 to increase each component.

methods.name: darker

returns.description: A new Color object that is a darker version of this Color

methods.description: Creates a new Color that is a darker version of this Color. Uses a factor of 0.7 to decrease each component.

methods.name: equals

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to test for equality with this Color

returns.description: True if the objects are the same color

methods.description: Determines whether another object is equal to this Color. Returns true if and only if the argument is a Color with the same RGBA values.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: A string representation of this Color

methods.description: Returns a string representation of this Color, including its r, g, b values.

fields.name: black
fields.description: The color black (0, 0, 0). Lowercase alias for BLACK.

fields.name: blue
fields.description: The color blue (0, 0, 255). Lowercase alias for BLUE.

fields.name: cyan
fields.description: The color cyan (0, 255, 255). Lowercase alias for CYAN.

fields.name: darkGray
fields.description: The color dark gray (64, 64, 64). Lowercase alias for DARK_GRAY.

fields.name: gray
fields.description: The color gray (128, 128, 128). Lowercase alias for GRAY.

fields.name: green
fields.description: The color green (0, 255, 0). Lowercase alias for GREEN.

fields.name: lightGray
fields.description: The color light gray (192, 192, 192). Lowercase alias for LIGHT_GRAY.

fields.name: magenta
fields.description: The color magenta (255, 0, 255). Lowercase alias for MAGENTA.

fields.name: orange
fields.description: The color orange (255, 200, 0). Lowercase alias for ORANGE.

fields.name: pink
fields.description: The color pink (255, 175, 175). Lowercase alias for PINK.

fields.name: red
fields.description: The color red (255, 0, 0). Lowercase alias for RED.

fields.name: white
fields.description: The color white (255, 255, 255). Lowercase alias for WHITE.

fields.name: yellow
fields.description: The color yellow (255, 255, 0). Lowercase alias for YELLOW.

classes.name: Font
classes.description: Represents fonts used to render text. Commonly used in Ignition Vision for dynamic font styling in scripts.

params.name: style
params.description: The style constant (Font.PLAIN, Font.BOLD, Font.ITALIC, or Font.BOLD | Font.ITALIC)

params.name: size
params.description: The point size of the font

constructors.description: Creates a new Font from the specified name, style, and point size.

methods.name: decode

returns.description: The Font object that str describes

methods.description: Returns the Font that the str argument describes. The string should be in the format 'fontname-style-pointsize' (e.g., 'Arial-BOLD-12').

methods.name: getName

returns.description: The logical name of this Font

methods.description: Returns the logical name of this Font.

methods.name: getFamily

returns.description: The family name of this Font

methods.description: Returns the family name of this Font.

methods.name: getSize

returns.description: The point size of this Font, rounded to an integer

methods.description: Returns the point size of this Font, rounded to an integer.

methods.name: getSize2D

returns.description: The point size of this Font as a float value

methods.description: Returns the point size of this Font as a float value.

methods.name: getStyle

returns.description: The style of this Font (PLAIN, BOLD, ITALIC, or BOLD|ITALIC)

methods.description: Returns the style of this Font. The style can be PLAIN, BOLD, ITALIC, or BOLD+ITALIC.

methods.name: isBold

returns.description: True if this Font has the BOLD style

methods.description: Indicates whether this Font object's style is BOLD.

methods.name: isItalic

returns.description: True if this Font has the ITALIC style

methods.description: Indicates whether this Font object's style is ITALIC.

methods.name: isPlain

returns.description: True if this Font has the PLAIN style

methods.description: Indicates whether this Font object's style is PLAIN.

methods.name: deriveFont

params.name: style
params.description: The style for the new Font (e.g., Font.BOLD)

returns.description: A new Font object with the specified style

methods.description: Creates a new Font object by replicating this Font with a new style.

methods.name: deriveFont

params.name: size
params.description: The size for the new Font

returns.description: A new Font object with the specified size

methods.description: Creates a new Font object by replicating this Font with a new size.

methods.name: deriveFont

params.name: style
params.description: The style for the new Font

params.name: size
params.description: The size for the new Font

returns.description: A new Font object with the specified style and size

methods.description: Creates a new Font object by replicating this Font with a new style and size.

methods.name: canDisplay

returns.description: True if this Font has a glyph for the specified character

methods.description: Checks if this Font has a glyph for the specified character.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: A string representation of this Font

methods.description: Converts this Font object to a String representation.

classes.name: Dimension
classes.description: Encapsulates the width and height of a component in integer precision. Used for component sizing in Ignition Vision.

constructors.description: Creates a Dimension with a width of zero and a height of zero.
Constructs a Dimension with the specified width and height.
Creates a Dimension whose width and height are the same as the specified Dimension.

methods.name: getWidth

returns.description: The width of this Dimension as a double

methods.description: Returns the width of this Dimension in double precision.

methods.name: getHeight

returns.description: The height of this Dimension as a double

methods.description: Returns the height of this Dimension in double precision.

methods.name: setSize
methods.description: Sets the size of this Dimension to the specified width and height.

methods.name: setSize

params.name: d
params.description: The new size for this Dimension

methods.description: Sets the size of this Dimension to match the specified Dimension.

methods.name: equals

returns.description: True if the objects are equal

methods.description: Checks whether two Dimension objects have equal values.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: A string representation of this Dimension

methods.description: Returns a string representation of the values of this Dimension object.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The width dimension. Negative values are undefined.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height dimension. Negative values are undefined.

classes.name: Point
classes.description: Represents a location in (x, y) coordinate space, specified in integer precision.

constructors.description: Constructs a Point at the origin (0, 0) of the coordinate space.
Constructs a Point at the specified (x, y) location.
Constructs a Point with the same location as the specified Point.

methods.name: getX

returns.description: The x coordinate of this Point as a double

methods.description: Returns the X coordinate of this Point in double precision.

methods.name: getY

returns.description: The y coordinate of this Point as a double

methods.description: Returns the Y coordinate of this Point in double precision.

methods.name: setLocation
methods.description: Changes the point to have the specified location.

methods.name: translate

params.name: dx
params.description: The distance to move along the x axis

params.name: dy
params.description: The distance to move along the y axis

methods.description: Translates this point, at location (x, y), by dx along the x axis and dy along the y axis.

methods.name: move
methods.description: Moves this point to the specified location in the (x, y) coordinate plane.

methods.name: equals

returns.description: True if the objects are equal

methods.description: Determines whether two points are equal. Two instances of Point are equal if the values of their x and y member fields are the same.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: A string representation of this Point

methods.description: Returns a string representation of this point and its location in the (x, y) coordinate space.

classes.name: Rectangle
classes.description: Specifies an area in a coordinate space enclosed by the Rectangle object's upper-left point (x, y) and its width and height.

constructors.description: Constructs a new Rectangle whose upper-left corner is at (0, 0) with width and height both zero.

params.name: x
params.description: The x coordinate of the upper-left corner

params.name: y
params.description: The y coordinate of the upper-left corner

constructors.description: Constructs a new Rectangle whose upper-left corner is specified as (x, y) and whose width and height are specified by the arguments of the same name.
Constructs a new Rectangle whose upper-left corner is at (0, 0) with the specified width and height.

params.name: p
params.description: A Point that is the upper-left corner of the Rectangle

params.name: d
params.description: A Dimension representing the width and height

constructors.description: Constructs a new Rectangle whose upper-left corner is the specified Point and whose width and height are specified by the Dimension.

methods.name: getX

returns.description: The x coordinate of the upper-left corner

methods.description: Returns the X coordinate of the upper-left corner of this Rectangle in double precision.

methods.name: getY

returns.description: The y coordinate of the upper-left corner

methods.description: Returns the Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of this Rectangle in double precision.

methods.name: getWidth

returns.description: The width of this Rectangle

methods.description: Returns the width of this Rectangle in double precision.

methods.name: getHeight

returns.description: The height of this Rectangle

methods.description: Returns the height of this Rectangle in double precision.

methods.name: getBounds

returns.description: A new Rectangle identical to this Rectangle

methods.description: Gets the bounding Rectangle of this Rectangle.

methods.name: setBounds

params.name: x
params.description: The new x coordinate of the upper-left corner

params.name: y
params.description: The new y coordinate of the upper-left corner

methods.description: Sets the bounding Rectangle of this Rectangle to the specified x, y, width, and height.

methods.name: contains

returns.description: True if the point (x, y) is inside this Rectangle

methods.description: Checks whether this Rectangle contains the point at the specified location (x, y).

methods.name: contains

returns.description: True if the Point is inside this Rectangle

methods.description: Checks whether this Rectangle contains the specified Point.

methods.name: intersects

returns.description: True if this Rectangle and the specified Rectangle intersect

methods.description: Determines whether this Rectangle and the specified Rectangle intersect. Two rectangles intersect if their intersection is nonempty.

methods.name: intersection

returns.description: The largest Rectangle contained in both this Rectangle and the specified Rectangle

methods.description: Computes the intersection of this Rectangle with the specified Rectangle. Returns a new Rectangle representing the intersection.

methods.name: union

returns.description: The smallest Rectangle containing both this Rectangle and the specified Rectangle

methods.description: Computes the union of this Rectangle with the specified Rectangle. Returns a new Rectangle representing the union.

methods.name: isEmpty

returns.description: True if this Rectangle is empty

methods.description: Determines whether this Rectangle is empty. A Rectangle is empty if its width or height is less than or equal to zero.

methods.name: translate

params.name: dx
params.description: The distance to move along the x axis

params.name: dy
params.description: The distance to move along the y axis

methods.description: Translates this Rectangle the indicated distance, to the right along the x axis and downward along the y axis.

methods.name: grow

params.name: h
params.description: The horizontal expansion on both left and right sides

params.name: v
params.description: The vertical expansion on both top and bottom

methods.description: Resizes this Rectangle both horizontally and vertically. The left and right edges are moved outward by h, and the top and bottom by v.

methods.name: equals

returns.description: True if the objects are equal

methods.description: Checks whether two rectangles are equal. Two instances of Rectangle are equal if their position and size are the same.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: A string representation of this Rectangle

methods.description: Returns a String representing this Rectangle and its values.

fields.name: x
fields.description: The x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the Rectangle.

fields.name: y
fields.description: The y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the Rectangle.

classes.name: Cursor
classes.description: Encapsulates the bitmap representation of the mouse cursor. Used in Ignition Vision to change cursor appearance on components.

params.name: type
params.description: The type of the predefined cursor (e.g., Cursor.HAND_CURSOR)

constructors.description: Creates a new cursor object with the specified type.

methods.name: getPredefinedCursor

params.name: type
params.description: The type of the predefined cursor

returns.description: The specified predefined cursor

methods.description: Returns a cursor object with the specified predefined type.

methods.name: getDefaultCursor

returns.description: The default cursor

methods.description: Returns the system default cursor.

methods.name: getType

returns.description: The cursor type

methods.description: Returns the type for this cursor.

methods.name: getName

returns.description: The localized description of this cursor

methods.description: Returns the name of this cursor.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: A string representation of this cursor

methods.description: Returns a string representation of this cursor.

classes.name: BasicStroke
classes.description: Defines a basic set of rendering attributes for the outlines of graphics primitives. Used in Ignition Vision for custom drawing operations.

constructors.description: Constructs a new BasicStroke with defaults of 1.0 width, CAP_SQUARE, JOIN_MITER, and a miter limit of 10.0.
Constructs a solid BasicStroke with the specified line width and with default values for CAP_SQUARE, JOIN_MITER, and miter limit of 10.0.

params.name: cap
params.description: The decoration of the ends of a BasicStroke (CAP_BUTT, CAP_ROUND, or CAP_SQUARE)

params.name: join
params.description: The decoration applied where path segments meet (JOIN_BEVEL, JOIN_MITER, or JOIN_ROUND)

constructors.description: Constructs a solid BasicStroke with the specified attributes.

params.name: cap
params.description: The decoration of the ends of a BasicStroke

params.name: join
params.description: The decoration applied where path segments meet

params.name: miterlimit
params.description: The limit to trim the miter join (must be >= 1.0)

constructors.description: Constructs a solid BasicStroke with the specified attributes including miter limit.

methods.name: getLineWidth

returns.description: The line width of this BasicStroke

methods.description: Returns the line width.

methods.name: getEndCap

returns.description: The end cap style (CAP_BUTT, CAP_ROUND, or CAP_SQUARE)

methods.description: Returns the end cap style.

methods.name: getLineJoin

returns.description: The line join style (JOIN_BEVEL, JOIN_MITER, or JOIN_ROUND)

methods.description: Returns the line join style.

methods.name: getMiterLimit

returns.description: The limit of miter joins

methods.description: Returns the limit of miter joins.

fields.name: CAP_BUTT
fields.description: Ends unclosed subpaths with no added decoration (0).

fields.name: CAP_ROUND
fields.description: Ends unclosed subpaths with a round decoration that has a radius equal to half the width (1).

fields.name: CAP_SQUARE
fields.description: Ends unclosed subpaths with a square projection extending half the line width (2).

fields.name: JOIN_BEVEL
fields.description: Joins path segments by connecting the outer corners with a straight segment (2).

fields.name: JOIN_MITER
fields.description: Joins path segments by extending their outside edges until they meet (0).

fields.name: JOIN_ROUND
fields.description: Joins path segments by rounding off the corner at a radius of half the line width (1).
